name: Popup for Contact Form 7
author: aiyaz

sections.description:
Popup for Contact Form 7 plugin will display the fully customizable and beautiful popup when contact form 7 is submitted. you can customize text, font-color, popup size etc.

Contact Form 7 Popup features:

  • Shows popup when form submitted successfully.
  • You can customize popup content, background and font color.
  • Popup is fully responsive and compatible in all major browser.
sections.installation:
1. Install and Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  2. You can change settings inside “Contact >> Popup” in wordpress admin.
sections.faq:
Installation Instructions

  1. Install and Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  2. You can change settings inside “Contact >> Popup” in wordpress admin.

Can I set different popup for individual contact form?

No, Currently this plugin supports same popup template for all forms, however you can enable/disable popup on specific form.

Can I customize Popup design?

Yes, You can customize popup text, design under Contact >> Popup settings menu.
sections.changelog:
1.3

  • Compatible with latest WordPress and Contact form 7.
  • Fixed editor issue.
  • Fixed no popup after submitting form issue.

1.2

  • fixed reported bugs

1.1

  • Added option for popup Width X height, font-color, background image, color picker and footer text option.
  • Added popup auto hide option.
  • Added wp editor for text description.

1.0

  • first Release

short_description: This plugin will show the popup when Contact Form 7 has been submitted. You can customize popup title, message and colors from backend.
description:
Popup for Contact Form 7 plugin will display the fully customizable and beautiful popup when contact form 7 is submitted. you can customize text, font-color, popup size etc.

Contact Form 7 Popup features:

  • Shows popup when form submitted successfully.
  • You can customize popup content, background and font color.
  • Popup is fully responsive and compatible in all major browser.

upgrade_notice.1.3:
1. Check the plugin "popup settings" section under contact menu and update the new settings.
  2. Select the contact form from the "Popup Settings" >> "General Settings".
  3. This plugin might not work on before 3.4.2 WP version.
